full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
*Mandatory Asterisk Denotes Information Required *

### Notice Title and Reference Number

* Notice title in English: National Public Procurement - S4932611 - Special Advisor - Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
* Notice title in French: Approvisionnement public national - S4932611 - Conseiller spécial - Services d'aide temporaire dans le cadre de l’arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale (RCN)
* Reference Number: cb-12-85505767
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: S4932611
* Publication Date: 2024-06-12
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-06-18, 15:30:00
* Amendment Date: 2024-06-18

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity and Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name in English: Department of National Defense
* Contracting Entity Name in French: Ministère de la Défense Nationale
* Contracting Entity Address in English: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada
* Contracting Entity Address in French: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Contact Person: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
	+ Contact Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
	+ Contact Phone: (613) 971-7955
	+ Contact Fax: None


### Tender Description

Temporary Help Services Requirement: The Department of National Defense (DND) requires temporary help services under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is open to supply arrangement holders who have qualified under stream 13.9, Special Advisor Category. The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

	+ 1019837 Ontario Inc.
	+ Akkodis
